basic.name: Tanish Dhingra
basic.title: Full-Stack Developer (MERN + WebSockets + Real-time Systems)
basic.shortBio: Full-stack developer who learns by building, not by theory. Strong focus on clean, fast, real-time applications.

bio.longBio: I started coding through YouTube tutorials, slowly improving by building projects and gaining real experience from internships. I'm an introvert, an overthinker, highly logical, sometimes lame with jokes, very selective, and perfection-driven. Anxiety has been with me since childhood, but I keep moving because staying idle makes things worse. I'm a mix of depressive, narcissistic, self-hating yet extremely potential-driven. Video games, friends, and sleep are my coping mechanisms. I value perfection in my work and believe in learning through doing, not by theory. My personality is quiet but sharp, and I approach problems by eliminating the wrong paths until only the best solution remains.

goals.longTerm: Will explore different paths after gaining proper experience and decide accordingly.

personality.workStyle: I can work anywhere as long as I have earphones and noise cancellation with YouTube playing.
personality.motivation: Nothing specific motivates me, but I can't sit idle. Staying busy keeps my anxiety low, and I know my potential, so I push myself not to waste it.
funFacts: Every decision in life feels like a fun fact.

details: Collaborated in a team of 5 to deliver 3+ responsive web applications, improving load performance by 25%.
Built reusable UI components and reduced redundant code by 30%.
Debugged and resolved 15+ frontend and backend issues following Agile practices.

achievements: Secured 4th place at Smart India Hackathon (SIH) 2023
Built and deployed multiple full-stack and real-time applications

projects.name: Tweniq
highlights: Two separate profiles for each user with 2 separate chat identities
projects.whyBuilt: Wanted a full solo project to learn everything myself—from CSS to deployment.
projects.whatLearned: Experience in full-stack, real deployments, and real-time systems.
uniqueFeatures: Two separate chat accounts per user
projects.thoughtProcess: Planned structure in 2–3 hours with AI. Started with basics like login/signup and kept building layer by layer.

projects.name: CopyWizz
highlights: Instant AI explanations from any app
projects.whyBuilt: A useful idea clicked in mind; wanted to build something practical.
uniqueFeatures: Explain anything on screen with a single click
projects.thoughtProcess: Planned similarly to Tweniq — start simple, then expand.

projects.name: Browser Vulnerability Analyzer
projects.whyBuilt: To explore cybersecurity risks and browser data extraction.
challenges: Encryption behavior and parsing data formats
uniqueFeatures: Automated data extraction and Telegram bot integration
projects.thoughtProcess: Explore cybersecurity through a practical tool rather than reading about it.

interests.gym: I don't like going to the gym, but I go because it helps my mental health and physical fitness.
